name: enhanced-tax-harvesting-service
description: Enhanced Tax Harvesting Service with Neon Database Integration - Portfolio rebalancing and tax optimization platform

scripts.build:production: npm run build:static && npm run copy:assets
scripts.build:react: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:static: echo 'Updating static distribution for production deployment' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r src/* dist/
scripts.copy:assets: cp -r assets/* dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/data dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/build && rm -rf dist/*.html dist/*.js dist/*.css

author: Enhanced Tax Harvesting Service
